lossom Brislen was a daughter of Leepak and Dharin Brislen and sister to Bunny, all inhabitants of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Unlike the rest of her family, Bunny was a human with a light skin tone. She had hazel eyes and bright red hair.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Dharin Brislen attempted to ship Leepak and their daughters away from the Gate. He attempted to negotiate a passage to Waterdeep with Captain Sleam, a smuggler with her own boat and crew. Sleam asked for too much money, claiming it was a life-and-death situation for her crew too. Dharin could not afford to pay for four seats, so he resorted to staying behind. It was unknown if Leepak and the girls escaped the Gate before the battle of the Upper City commenced.
